name: KinAce
description: The KinAce web portal aggregates and visualizes the network of interactions between protein-kinases and their substrates in the human genome.
full_citation: Sekar, J.A.P., Li, Y.C., Schlessinger, A. et al. A web portal for exploring kinase-substrate interactions. npj Syst Biol Appl 10, 113 (2024). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41540-024-00442-5
